1   package com.anthavio.httl.cache;
2   
3   import java.util.HashMap;
4   import java.util.Map;
5   import java.util.Map.Entry;
6   import java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService;
7   import java.util.concurrent.RejectedExecutionException;
8   import java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit;
9   
10  import org.slf4j.Logger;
11  import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
12  
13  import com.anthavio.cache.Cache.RefreshMode;
14  import com.anthavio.cache.CacheBase;
15  import com.anthavio.cache.CacheEntry;
16  import com.anthavio.httl.HttpSender;
17  import com.anthavio.httl.SenderRequest;
18  import com.anthavio.httl.cache.CachingRequestBuilders.CachingExtractorRequestBuilder;
19  import com.anthavio.httl.inout.ResponseBodyExtractor.ExtractedBodyResponse;
20  
21  /**
22   * Sender wrapper caches product of Response extraction.
23   * 
24   * For asynchronous/scheduled cache refreshing, executor service must be set.
25   * 
26   * @author martin.vanek
27   *
28   */
29  public class CachingExtractor {
30  
31  	private final Logger logger = LoggerFactory.getLogger(getClass());
32  
33  	private final CacheBase<Object> cache;
34  
35  	private final HttpSender sender;
36  
37  	private ExecutorService executor;
38  
39  	private Map<String, CachingExtractorRequest<?>> refresh = new HashMap<String, CachingExtractorRequest<?>>();
40  
41  	private Map<String, CachingExtractorRequest<?>> scheduled = new HashMap<String, CachingExtractorRequest<?>>();
42  
43  	private RefreshSchedulerThread scheduler;
44  
45  	/**
46  	 * Create fully initialized CachingExtractor
47  	 * 
48  	 * @param sender underlying HttpSender
49  	 * @param cache underlying cache
50  	 * @param executor for asynchronous updates
51  	 */
52  	public CachingExtractor(HttpSender sender, CacheBase<Object> cache, ExecutorService executor) {
53  		if (sender == null) {
54  			throw new IllegalArgumentException("sender is null");
55  		}
56  		this.sender = sender;
57  
58  		if (cache == null) {
59  			throw new IllegalArgumentException("cache is null");
60  		}
61  		this.cache = cache;
62  
63  		if (executor != null) {
64  			this.executor = executor;
65  		} else {
66  			this.executor = sender.getExecutor(); //can be null
67  		}
68  	}
69  
70  	/**
71  	 * Create CachingExtractor without asychronous updates support
72  	 * 
73  	 * @param sender
74  	 * @param cache
75  	 */
76  	public CachingExtractor(HttpSender sender, CacheBase<Object> cache) {
77  		this(sender, cache, null);
78  	}
79  
80  	/**
81  	 * @return underlying executor service
82  	 */
83  	public ExecutorService getExecutor() {
84  		return executor;
85  	}
86  
87  	/**
88  	 * Sets executor service for asychronous updates
89  	 */
90  	public void setExecutor(ExecutorService executor) {
91  		this.executor = executor;
92  	}
93  
94  	/**
95  	 * @return underlying sender
96  	 */
97  	public HttpSender getSender() {
98  		return sender;
99  	}
100 
101 	/**
102 	 * @return underlying cache
103 	 */
104 	public CacheBase<?> getCache() {
105 		return cache;
106 	}
107 
108 	/**
109 	 * Close underlying scheduler (if created)
110 	 */
111 	public void close() {
112 		if (this.scheduler != null) {
113 			scheduler.keepGoing = false;
114 			scheduler.interrupt();
115 		}
116 	}
117 
118 	/**
119 	 * Fancy toString
120 	 */
121 	@Override
122 	public String toString() {
123 		return "CachingExtractor [url=" + sender.getConfig().getHostUrl() + ", executor=" + executor + ", updating="
124 				+ refresh.size() + ", scheduled=" + scheduled.size() + "]";
125 	}
126 
127 	/**
128 	 * Start fluent builder
129 	 */
130 	public <T> CachingExtractorRequestBuilder request(SenderRequest request) {
131 		return new CachingExtractorRequestBuilder(this, request);
132 	}
133 
134 	/**
135 	 * Custom cache key from request (if exist) takes precedence
136 	 * Otherwise key derived from request URL is used
137 	 */
138 	protected String getCacheKey(CachingRequest request) {
139 		String cacheKey = request.getCacheKey();
140 		if (cacheKey == null) {
141 			cacheKey = sender.getCacheKey(request.getSenderRequest());
142 		}
143 		return cacheKey;
144 	}
145 
146 	/**
147 	 * Extracted response version. Response is extracted, then closed and result is returned to caller
148 	 * Static caching based on specified amount and unit
149 	 */
150 	public <T> CacheEntry<T> extract(CachingExtractorRequest<T> request) {
151 		String cacheKey = getCacheKey(request);
152 		CacheEntry<T> entry = (CacheEntry<T>) cache.get(cacheKey); //XXX expect ClassCastException
153 		if (entry != null) {
154 			if (!entry.isSoftExpired()) {
155 				return (CacheEntry<T>) entry; //fresh hit
156 			} else {
157 				//soft expired - refresh needed
158 				logger.debug("Soft expired " + cacheKey);
159 				RefreshMode mode = request.getRefreshMode();
160 				if (mode == RefreshMode.BLOCK) {
161 					//logger.debug("Sync refresh start " + cacheKey);
162 					return refresh(cacheKey, request);
163 				} else if (mode == RefreshMode.ASYNC || mode == RefreshMode.RETURN) {
164 					asyncRefresh(cacheKey, request); //start asynchronous refresh
165 					logger.debug("Soft expired value returned " + cacheKey);
166 					return entry; //return soft expired value
167 				} else if (mode == RefreshMode.SCHEDULED) {
168 					if (scheduled.get(cacheKey) == null) {
169 						asyncRefresh(cacheKey, request);
170 						addScheduled(cacheKey, request);
171 					}
172 					logger.debug("Soft expired value returned " + cacheKey);
173 					return entry; //return soft expired value
174 				} else {
175 					throw new IllegalArgumentException("Unknown RefreshMode " + mode);
176 				}
177 			}
178 		} else { //cache miss - we have nothing
179 			RefreshMode mode = request.getRefreshMode();
180 			if (mode == RefreshMode.BLOCK || mode == RefreshMode.RETURN) {
181 				return refresh(cacheKey, request);
182 			} else if (mode == RefreshMode.ASYNC) {
183 				asyncRefresh(cacheKey, request);
184 				return null;
185 			} else if (mode == RefreshMode.SCHEDULED) {
186 				if (scheduled.get(cacheKey) == null) {
187 					asyncRefresh(cacheKey, request);
188 					addScheduled(cacheKey, request);
189 				}
190 				return null;
191 			} else {
192 				throw new IllegalArgumentException("Unknown RefreshMode " + mode);
193 			}
194 		}
195 	}
196 
197 	/**
198 	 * Extract response and store product in cache
199 	 */
200 	private <T> CacheEntry<T> refresh(String cacheKey, CachingExtractorRequest<T> request) {
201 		CacheEntry<T> entry;
202 		ExtractedBodyResponse<T> extracted;
203 		if (request.getExtractor() != null) {
204 			extracted = sender.extract(request.getSenderRequest(), request.getExtractor());
205 		} else {
206 			extracted = sender.extract(request.getSenderRequest(), request.getResultType());
207 		}
208 		request.setLastRefresh(System.currentTimeMillis());
209 		entry = new CacheEntry<T>(extracted.getBody(), request.getHardTtl(), request.getSoftTtl());
210 		cache.set(cacheKey, (CacheEntry<Object>) entry);
211 		return entry;
212 	}
213 
214 	private <T> void asyncRefresh(String cacheKey, CachingExtractorRequest<T> request) {
215 		synchronized (refresh) {
216 			if (refresh.containsKey(cacheKey)) {
217 				logger.debug("Async refresh already running " + cacheKey);
218 			} else {
219 				logger.debug("Async refresh starting " + cacheKey);
220 				try {
221 					executor.execute(new RefreshRunnable<T>(request));
222 				} catch (RejectedExecutionException rx) {
223 					logger.warn("Async refresh rejected " + rx.getMessage());
224 				} catch (Exception x) {
225 					logger.error("Async refresh start failed " + cacheKey, x);
226 				}
227 			}
228 		}
229 	}
230 
231 	/**
232 	 * Schedule new request for automatic refresh
233 	 */
234 	private <T> void addScheduled(String cacheKey, CachingExtractorRequest<T> request) {
235 		//schedule if not already scheduled
236 		if (scheduled.get(cacheKey) != null) {
237 			logger.debug("Request is already scheduled to refresh" + cacheKey);
238 		} else {
239 			scheduled.put(cacheKey, request);
240 			logger.debug("Request is now scheduled to be refreshed " + cacheKey);
241 			synchronized (this) {
242 				if (scheduler == null) {
243 					scheduler = new RefreshSchedulerThread(1, TimeUnit.SECONDS);
244 					scheduler.start();
245 				}
246 			}
247 		}
248 	}
249 
250 	/**
251 	 * Runnable for {@link RefreshMode#ASYNC}
252 	 * 
253 	 */
254 	private class RefreshRunnable<T> implements Runnable {
255 
256 		private final CachingExtractorRequest<T> request;
257 
258 		public RefreshRunnable(CachingExtractorRequest<T> request) {
259 			if (request == null) {
260 				throw new IllegalArgumentException("request is null");
261 			}
262 			this.request = request;
263 		}
264 
265 		@Override
266 		public void run() {
267 			String cacheKey = getCacheKey(request);
268 			try {
269 				refresh(cacheKey, request);
270 			} catch (Exception x) {
271 				logger.warn("Failed to refresh " + request, x);
272 			} finally {
273 				refresh.remove(cacheKey);
274 			}
275 		}
276 
277 	}
278 
279 	/**
280 	 * Thread for {@link RefreshMode#SCHEDULED}
281 	 * 
282 	 * @author martin.vanek
283 	 *
284 	 */
285 	private class RefreshSchedulerThread extends Thread {
286 
287 		private final long interval;
288 
289 		private boolean keepGoing = true;
290 
291 		public RefreshSchedulerThread(long interval, TimeUnit unit) {
292 			this.interval = unit.toMillis(interval);
293 			if (this.interval < 1000) {
294 				throw new IllegalArgumentException("Interval " + this.interval + " must be >= 1000 millis");
295 			}
296 			setDaemon(true);
297 			setName("scheduler-ce-" + sender.getConfig().getHostUrl());
298 		}
299 
300 		@Override
301 		public void run() {
302 			logger.info(getName() + " started");
303 			while (keepGoing) {
304 				try {
305 					Thread.sleep(interval);
306 				} catch (InterruptedException ix) {
307 					logger.info(getName() + " interrupted");
308 					if (!keepGoing) {
309 						break;
310 					}
311 				}
312 				try {
313 					check();
314 				} catch (Exception x) {
315 					logger.warn(getName() + " check iteration failed", x);
316 				}
317 			}
318 			logger.info(getName() + " stopped");
319 		}
320 
321 		private void check() {
322 			long now = System.currentTimeMillis();
323 			logger.debug("check");
324 
325 			for (Entry<String, CachingExtractorRequest<?>> entry : scheduled.entrySet()) {
326 				try {
327 					CachingExtractorRequest<?> request = entry.getValue();
328 					if (request.getSoftExpire() < now) {
329 						String cacheKey = getCacheKey(request);
330 						asyncRefresh(cacheKey, request);
331 					}
332 				} catch (Exception x) {
333 					logger.warn("Exception during refresh of " + entry.getValue(), x);
334 				}
335 			}
336 
337 		}
338 	}
339 
340 }
